function_description: Move list within the same board using drag and drop
initial_state: User is on a board with multiple lists visible on the screen.
steps: Locate the list you wish to move.
Click and hold the mouse button on the list header.
Drag the list to the desired location within the same board.
Release the mouse button to drop the list in the new position.
expected_state: The list is positioned in the new location within the same board, maintaining its contents and order.
